title: North Carolina Insurance Regulator Calls for State Blue Cross CEO to Resign
text:
North Carolina’s insurance commissioner called for the resignation of Patrick Conway as chief executive of Blue Cross & Blue Shield of North Carolina, citing his arrest in an allegedly alcohol-related traffic accident.

The commissioner, Mike Causey, also faulted the Blue Cross board for waiting three months to notify him that Dr. Conway had been arrested on June 22 after allegedly swerving out of his lane on an interstate highway and hitting a truck. description: North Carolina Insurance Commissioner Mike Causey said the board of Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina “covered up” charges against its CEO, Patrick Conway, after an allegedly alcohol-related highway collision.
